title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.106 - Emergency services category 3-general emergency services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.106 - Emergency services category 3-general emergency services

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements for category 4 facility, a category 3 facility should have 24-hour in-house physician coverage and
in-house storage of whole blood or packed red cells. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.106

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
